resources.string: Welcome to BookLab! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our online bookstore platform.

1. Information We Collect 
When you create an account, make a purchase, or interact with BookLab, we may collect the following information:
Personal Information: Your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a purchase or create an account.
Book Information: Details related to your purchases, wishlist, or reading preferences to help us recommend books you might enjoy.
Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our platform, such as pages viewed, searches, and shopping activities.
Device Information: Details about the device you use to access BookLab, including your IP address, browser type, and operating system.
2. How We Use Your Informationâ¨ We use your information to:
Process your purchases and deliver your orders.
Improve your shopping and reading experience.
Personalize book recommendations.
Communicate with you about updates, offers, and services.
Ensure platform security and prevent unauthorized access.
3. Information Sharingâ¨ We do not sell or rent your personal data. Your information is only shared with trusted service providers (such as payment processors or delivery partners) to complete your orders or improve our services.
4. Data Securityâ¨ We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse.
5. Your Rightsâ¨ You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also contact us if you have any privacy-related concerns.
